mapper.select: SELECT B.film_id filmid, A.original_title title, A.popularity, A.poster_path poster, B.likeCount likeCount FROM fm_film A INNER JOIN ( SELECT film_id, count(code) AS likeCount FROM fm_film_reaction WHERE code = 1 AND insert_ts BETWEEN current_date - 7 AND current_date GROUP BY film_id ORDER BY count(code) DESC ) B ON A.film_id = B.film_id WHERE rownum <= 5

SELECT A.rno rno, B.film_id filmid, C.nickname nickname, A.rate rate, A.content content, A.insert_ts insertTs, A.like_cnt likeCnt, A.comment_cnt commentCnt, to_char(B.release_date, 'YYYY') year, B.original_title title, B.poster_path poster, A.rate * 20 width, C.user_id userid, C.profile_photo_path profilePhoto FROM fm_review A LEFT OUTER JOIN fm_film B ON A.film_id = B.film_id LEFT OUTER JOIN fm_user C ON A.writer = C.user_id WHERE A.insert_ts > current_date - 7 AND A.delete_ts IS NULL AND A.is_spoiled = 'F' ORDER BY A.like_cnt DESC, A.comment_cnt DESC, A.rate DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT A.film_id filmid, A.original_title title, to_char(A.release_date, 'YYYY') year, A.poster_path poster FROM fm_film A INNER JOIN fm_genre B ON A.film_id = B.film_id WHERE B.genre = #{genre} ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT A.film_id filmid, A.original_title title, to_char(A.release_date, 'YYYY') year, A.poster_path poster FROM fm_film A ORDER BY year DESC
